titleStmt.title: Declarations and pleadings in English: being the most authentique form of proceeding in courts of law; in actions reall, personall, and mixt; usefull for all practisers and students of the law, of what degree soever. / Collected by the most experienced and exact in his profession, Richard Brownlow, Esq; late chief prothnotary of the Court of Common Pleas. Whereto are added, choice presidents in the Upper Bench, by some others of good note. Published in order to the Act of Parliament, and for the good of the Common-wealth. With an exact table, wherein may be found the principall matters contained in this book.
titleStmt.author: Brownlow, Richard, 1553-1638.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.

titleStmt.title: Declarations and pleadings in English: being the most authentique form of proceeding in courts of law; in actions reall, personall, and mixt; usefull for all practisers and students of the law, of what degree soever. / Collected by the most experienced and exact in his profession, Richard Brownlow, Esq; late chief prothnotary of the Court of Common Pleas. Whereto are added, choice presidents in the Upper Bench, by some others of good note. Published in order to the Act of Parliament, and for the good of the Common-wealth. With an exact table, wherein may be found the principall matters contained in this book.
titleStmt.author: Brownlow, Richard, 1553-1638.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, thoroughly corrected and amended.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft, for Henry Twyford, and are to be sold at his shop in Vine-Court, Middle Temple,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
